original_text: And nobody can go to tell God's message to people unless God sends them. This is written in the Bible: ‘When people arrive to tell us good news, we say “welcome!” ’ 10: See Isaiah 52:7. And nobody can go to tell God's message to people unless God sends them. This is written in the Bible: ‘When people arrive to tell us good news, we say “welcome!” ’
korean_text: 보내심을 받지 아니하였으면 어찌 전파하리요 기록된 바 아름답도다 좋은 소식을 전하는 자들의 발이여 함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: And nobody can go to tell God's message to people
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 하나님의 메시지를 전하러 갈 수 없으며

sentences.original_text: This is written in the Bible
When people arrive to tell us good news
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 우리에게 좋은 소식을 전하기 위해 도착할 때

sentences.original_text: And nobody can go to tell God's message to people
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 하나님의 메시지를 전하러 갈 수 없으며

sentences.original_text: This is written in the Bible
When people arrive to tell us good news
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 우리에게 좋은 소식을 전하기 위해 도착할 때
